content.prompt: What did Masashi gain from the camp experience?

choices.label: He made friends with members from the United States.
He learned that he was a natural leader.
He impressed the staff at his local city hall.
He felt closer to people in other countries.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
